description: As a child, Tsurumi Chiriko was a shy girl and a member of the Super Peace Busters. Now, she is enrolled at an elite school with Matsuyuki. She is serious, stoic, and cocky. Upon meeting with Naruko, Chiriko insults both her and her friends. While the other members of the Super Peace Busters have fallen apart, Chiriko and Matsuyuki have remained friends after Menma`s death.
name: Tsurumi Chiriko
